name: Dani vs Billy (fangame)
description:
NB: This is a fangame, all assets are used without permission. Zoom out to play the game.

A couple of months ago I streamed myself making 6 games in 12 hours, which of one game was the start of this project. After that I procrastinated for 4 months, until finally deciding to spend a few days on this to finish it. Unfortunately I have 0 artistic sense, and my music is horrible, so I decided to not spend time on adding either of those to the game.

That said, it's a fun 3 minute experience, with some jokes you might recognize if you watch dani's videos on youtube (wishlist Karlson), and I urge you to try using the different "attacks" multiple times to see what changes. 

Credits (I think I took some stuff from danis thumbnails too that's not listed)

Return arrow by Kokota, for thenounproject.com
